entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Roblin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 p.m. CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm except 30 cm over higher terrain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
